Description.div: Document type associated with the records that would be purged when a purge runs.

Attribute.Name: Entity
Attribute.Description: The entity associated with this purge order.

Attribute.Name: LeadDays
Attribute.Description: Number of days to wait after which an eligible record may be deleted

Attribute.Name: Live
Attribute.Description: Mode in which purge is executed. If this is set to N, then the records are not purged. If set to Y, the records will be purged. If this attribute is specified, then the PurgeMode attribute need not be specified.

Attribute.Name: PurgeCode
Attribute.Description: A unique identifier for a criteria

Attribute.Name: PurgeMode
Attribute.Description: Mode in which purge is executed. It is "-T" for Test Mode and "-R" for Run Mode
